comments.author: tibschris

comments.text:
but you would freeze eventually. besides, if it was filled with anything, 
in a cartoon or ot, it wouldn't be called space now would it.
Let's just agree to say that this is a cartoon with a complete disregard 
for the laws of science and not argue. :)
comments.author: ParagonAffinity

comments.text:
+ParagonAffinity
Right. REAL space isn't filled with water. So now we're using REAL examples.
And you're not quite right: you would not freeze instantly like that. It's 
difficult to radiate body heat away in a vacuum, so you would stay pretty 
much the same temperature for a very long time.
comments.author: tibschris

comments.text:
+ParagonAffinity It's only cold because it is a vacuum. But because it is a 
vacuum, there is no heat loss by conduction. This makes a vacuum an 
extremely good insulator and it would taker a very long time to freeze. Nor 
would you explode because your flesh is capable of providing the pressure 
to keep your blood liquid. Though you would swell a bit. The biggest 
problem is the lung damage you would sustain if you held your breath before.
comments.author: Callinectes

comments.text:
+tibschris
It isn't filled with water, it's a vacuum. The human body would freeze as 
it is 70% water. That's after the head-exploding of course.

top_comment.text:
Umm, is this Homestuck? Like an almost complete ripoff?

The Blue-themed Male Dorky Hero with deep inner powers who's in a small 
love triangle with a girl he knew growing up and a grey skinned alien (John 
Egbert)
The Green-themed Female Calm Hero who is the techiast member of the group, 
looks and acts identical to a certain Jade Harley, especially with the 
glasses,  and has a universally psychic pet (Jade Harley)
The Green-themed Female Hero has a pet she had since she was a kid that has 
universal knowledge, but only within their universe, and equivalent psychic 
power, and this pet would sacrifice himself to protect her without 
hesitation(Becquerel).
The Red-themed Male Cool-kid Hero is the bro/wingman to the Dorky hero who 
can create time machines but often has sees future selves either dead or 
stopping him from doing some time travelling, becoming a doomed 
timeline/erased version of himself (Dave Strider)
All the heroes have adult parents almost never shown onscreen that are all 
super badasses compared to them.(Grandpa Harley, Mom Lalonde, Bro Strider, 
Dad Egbert(real names revealed later))  
The Pink-themed Female Horrorterror Hero is a mysterious character who's 
intentions and interests are up in the air early on and she is prone to 
horrorterror outbursts (Rose Lalonde)
The adorable Half-Cat, Half-Bug who's purely innocent but also loves drama 
and shipping (Nepeta Leijon)
And they all have energy sprites that can talk and form nearly anything 
they can summon with devices on their person.
Their universe lives in a gigantic entity the surrounds their universe that 
the heroes are partially responsible for creating via a full physical 
simulation video game(Billious Slick).

This is just Adventure Time with ideas stolen from Homestuck isn't it?

These ripoffs are WAAAY too specific to be coincidence. If they were less 
specific, maybe they might be.﻿

I did see the difference. however even after reading your descriptions I 
still didn't see the specifics that were enough for you to claim that they 
were rip offs. Half of them is stuff that you'd see in most japanese 
animes. Energy sprites? I can make you a list of comics that has that as a 
basis (wild siderz is a good one, check it out. The heroes are.... almost 
identical in nature) honestly, male dorky hero who falls in love with a 
strange female creature with unsure motives and is in a love triangle with 
his child hood friend who is also lusted over by said dorky heroes best 
friend? That doesn't seem familiar to about 12 other things? The only 
things thats changed is the color. Parents who are significantly more bad 
ass than their child counterparts? Final fantasy 10. once more the 
characters are similar. None of these things are difficult to replicate. 
Wankershim is one of the few things that I can't really make a claim to 
(technically final fantasy since everything was actually a dream inside of 
sin.) But the universe was always wankershim so what changed?

Once more, I'm not saying that they didn't rip crap off, but don't assume 
that homestuck was the only source if it was a source at all. There are so 
many just as interesting stories that you could take ideas from, doing that 
would be foolish.

comments.text:
Meet THE BRIGHTEST COLORS!!!

A story about 4 intrepid primaries who travel through the universe wherever 
they go! 

Blue! No color travels farther in the visible spectrum! He may seem calm 
and cool but behind it is hidden powerful wavelenghts! 

Green! She may not seem like much but when it comes to variance no one has 
more sway than she does on the RGB scale! The folcrum of the group, she 
keeps it all together!

Yellow! Bright, creative and fuzzy! He always manages to brighten up a room 
and can easily shed some light on a situation. When you're around him you 
can't help but feel warm!

Red! He may be the lowest on the scale but within him burns a firey heat 
that keeps the group going! Useful in more ways than you can count, the 
team might not even be a team if it wasn't for his big hertz!

Mix them together and you get a nigh unbeatable team!

But not all is well in the spectrum! Blue and green have been together for 
as long as they can remember. Infact you could say they've been together 
forever! But Blue is haunted by a vision of his future self! PURE BLUE. 
Also known as the WAVE LENGTH PRIMARY! He has returned from his long 
distanced travels into the unknown the warn Blue that he and Green will 
NEVER BLEND!

As if on cue, A mysterious and beautiful color VIOLET joins the crew. With 
her incredible ability to mix and charming and royal demeanor she quickly 
joins the visibles! However she has a deep secret. She is not one, but two 
colors! A sweet and caring Pink, and an ancient and all knowing Purple! 
Lead by a spectral enigma only called THE INDIGO. She seeks to take Blue 
away from green despite being her best friend from different ends of the 
spectrum!

Mean while, lurking within the invisible light spectrum is a terrifying 
spectral beast who seeks to slowly destroy all! Its name? THE ULTRA 
VIOLET!!! Together with Radio waves, once greens parent who attempted the 
forbidden and tried to mix himself with the invisible light spectrum, they 
seek to penetrate the visible spectral and thus destroy all! 

With their intrepid leader still trapped in the colorless void. Can green 
pull together the other colors enough to stop The ultra violet? Will blue 
ever accept his destiny as pure blue? Will violet succeed in closing the 
gap between her and blue and thus doom him to becoming old, alone and 
bananas?

See you next time on, THE BRIGHTEST COLORS!!!

In short they are literally the color spectrum.

Blue belongs with green but purple wants violet to be with blue or else it 
wouldn't exist. Yellow is red main man but he really wishes to get closer 
to green or violet because he is lonely and everyone thinks he's weak (when 
traveling through space red is the first to become black and is considered 
the faintest of the lights but it also represents life giving heat, making 
it equally as important thus why he is an inventor.) Green can mix with 
blue or red to make just about any color, making her incredibly versatile 
but the fate of most things hinges on who she choses to mix with. The only 
thing she can't make is purple, pink, or violet which is on the other side 
of the spectrum, thus why she is directly opposed by her. Ultraviolet is 
incredible powerful and is considered a radiation which is harmful to most 
life. "Don't look, its visage is too great for mortal minds to bare" - 
Horse 2013. pure blue is a blue that has traveled so far the other colors 
have been stripped away, leaving only blue. The deepest portion of the 
ocean where light can travel is blue because blue is the only thing that 
can travel that far. The sky is blue because blue's wavelength is so strong 
it can refract all over the place and keep going. 

and thats just the science part. Then we've got teenage mutant ninja 
turtles. The power rangers, my little pony, dungeons and dragons the show, 
thunder cats. All of which share many rough "aspects" with this show. Its 
not that hard. I won't say that things may not have been pulled off of 
homestuck, but i'm also saying just because a bullet lands in the same spot 
doesn't mean the person shooting the second gun was aiming for that. They 
just had similar targets.

comments.text:
+9752matt My only problem with that is that if this is going to be our 
argument I can think of a few books that adventure time is pretty much 
dragging its history directly out of. At the end of the day even insanity 
has its commonalities and I feel this is just an example of it.

1. omniscient horse: this one i'll give you. I have no idea why the decided 
to make a horse all knowing (even though we've already learned he actually 
isn't when in the see through zone.) it just seemed fucking hilarious at 
the time and this show is all about that.

2. Dude, everyone loves cats. Thats like saying one party ripped off 
another because they both had chocolate cake.

3. The universe isn't contained within a game construct as far as we know. 
What happens in the see through zone has no effect what so ever on the real 
world. Its a small pocket dimension created to be a prison, something like 
superman's null realm. That and homestuck are on two completely different 
scales.

I stopped reading homestuck a long time ago so I can't really say too much 
more than that. Though I don't recall insane time lords (more a startrek 
trope) and a plot that is based almost solely around a single ship 
happening being a part of homestuck too much (its pretty clear that the 
fate of many worlds and maybe a universe revolves around who beth falls in 
love with). So i'd say more likely one show is referencing the next, not so 
much ripping off. 

If its just aspects we are talking about then in something that is as crazy 
as this, having aspects suspiciously close to something else is 
surprisingly easy. (one punch man being a perfect example of that. A world 
where one super hero is too strong for his own good and being a super hero 
or a super villain is treated more like a career choice. The Incredibles 
anyone? Deathstroke maybe? Fucking superman?) Its really easy to look like 
something else, but what is important is how you deliver it, and bravest 
warriors has a completely different delivery to homestuck even if they are 
similar.

Morning Dad.
Hello daughter. Can I get you anything?

You're the boss.
Fellows. No more grab-assing. Begin!

Why don't you guys go French each

other in the brunch nook? This is seriously
like the billionth time you've Frenched.

Bloor ship in visual range!

Your eyes!

eyeball mites doesn't mean you're better
than me.

(slurping)
All hail Lord BloorBloor!
Bravest Warriors.

Big ups for answering our call. This afternoon,
our humongous fleet of kill cruisers... uh,

broke. They're all broken.
An entire fleet stranded, Lord BloorBloor?

I find that hard to swallow.
How do we know this isn't a trap?

Ow! This headache...

We're not falling

for this crap again BloorBloor! You can push
your fleet right on up inside your behind,

and just hold it there while you THINK about what you've done!!
Lieutenant Vasquez you

will cease this behavior at once!

Don't you guys see this? Everything keeps changing.

First you and Chris were Frenching, then Danny
had goat eyes. Chris is bald and acting bonkers...
First Officer Kirkman has always acted in accordance with Warship protocol.

What? Wallow--?
(slurping) What? I'm just nursing my big

old beer. Like always.
I had to put Kirkman out the
airlock for moop violations. Full of pepper, that one.
WHAT?!? You murdered Chris? You guys what's going on?

Officer Vasquez! Control your ladyfriend! 
This bridge is NO PLACE for a woman.

Yes Commander!

You are in a position to demand nothing, Kitchen Wench Tezuka.

Do not make me regret the day I purchased you 
from Wenches 'n Things.

Beth-- honey!
Get a hold of yourself!

Holy crap! 
You know I love you, but now is not the time for one of your hysterical

meltdowns!
Don't you care that Chris is dead??

Everything keeps changing around me!

It's happening faster now!
What is?! You're not making any sense!

Chris, I couldn't save you! I'm sorry!
You can't be dead! You can't be dead!

Aaagh!
Incoming priority transmission from Lord Catbug!

Lord Catbug?
Attention Bravest Destroyers!
All Hail Lord Catbug!
You're monsters! All of you are monsters!
What?? Someone throw that noisy thing out the airlock.

Wait! You can't--
Nope, out the airlock.

But I--
You've failed me for the last time,

Pleasure Clone Tezuka!
No! You can't!
Now, where's my big old beer?

There you are, yyyes.
No, stop!

Clone Tezuka!
No! You can’t! Now, where’s my big old

beer? There you are, yyyes.
No, stop! This has to be a dream! Or I’m
This has to be a dream! Or I'm stuck inside a Holo-John illusion, or it's an alien mind implant--
This can't be real! This can't be hap--

Beth? Tezuka? Can you hear us? You're freaking me out!
She's phasing back into sync with us.

Is she all gonna come back at once, 
or just different parts of her?
Chris, she's returning to our dimension...
Beth? Beth! I've got you! You're going

to be okay!
Chris! You're alive! I thought I'd lost you!
You must have met another

version of me from an alternate universe!
You were bouncing around parallel dimensions

like a pinball!
Everybody was acting insane. And you and Plum...

You're back where you belong now, Beth.
When you started dimension bouncing we detected
an energy field coming from your Dad's little cage. We found this.

I've seen this before...
Your dad disguised the machine as a pair of highly realistic
underwear to smuggle it out of the See-Through Zone.

Ewww!
We think he might have used the device
to send us that monster door.
Beth, the

field this thing generates is directly linked
to your brainwave patterns...

Alright my child. One more time.
Nnnnnneeh, Nnnnyeeehhhhnm...
Nnnnnnever doubt thhhe Worrrm.

Hangover!

title: Ralph Waldo Pickle Chips Returns in "Hamster Priest" - (Bravest Warriors Season 2 Ep. 4)
